title: Suffering Heart

tokens.lyric: Darkness gaining power within, tempting my soul to fall.

lines.raw: [C]Darkness gaining power within, tempting my soul to fall.

tokens.lyric: Weak is my heart, blurred are my thoughts, soon I am overcome.

lines.raw: [G7]Weak is my heart, blurred are my thoughts, soon I am overcome.

tokens.lyric: Blind to the truth, losing the Way, thinking of myself;

lines.raw: [Am]Blind to the truth, losing the Way, thinking of myself;

tokens.lyric: So I can see how sin began sprouting within my soul.

lines.raw: [Em]So I can see how sin began sprouting within my soul.

tokens.lyric: So I can see how sin began sprouting within my soul.

lines.raw: [Am]So I can see how sin began sprouting within my soul.

tokens.lyric: When my Lord came over to me, I would not hear His voice;

lines.raw: [Dm]When my Lord came over to me, I would not hear His voice;

tokens.lyric: Blinded and deaf, closing my heart, I ran away from Him.

lines.raw: [G7]Blinded and deaf, closing my heart, I ran away from Him.

tokens.lyric: So I remained lost in desire only for myself.

lines.raw: [C]So I remained lost in desire only for myself.

tokens.lyric: Grieving the Lord suffered for me, going again to the
cross.

lines.raw: [F]Grieving the Lord suffered for me, going again to the [G7]cross.

tokens.lyric: Grieving the Lord suffered for me, going again to the cross.

lines.raw: [C]Grieving the Lord suffered for me, going again to the cross.

tokens.lyric: To restore the black lonely night held by the power of sin,

lines.raw: [G7]To restore the black lonely night held by the power of sin,

tokens.lyric: Deserts He crossed, walking the way, climbing the rocky peaks.

lines.raw: [C]Deserts He crossed, walking the way, climbing the rocky peaks.

tokens.lyric: Searching for us people of sin who deserve to die,

lines.raw: [F]Searching for us people of sin who deserve to die,

tokens.lyric: How then could I ever begin thanking the Lord for such grace?

lines.raw: [G7]How then could I ever begin thanking the Lord for such grace?

tokens.lyric: How then could I ever begin thanking the Lord for such grace?

lines.raw: [C]How then could I ever begin thanking the Lord for such grace?

tokens.lyric: To defeat the power of death, fighting the realm of sin.

lines.raw: [Em]To defeat the power of death, fighting the realm of sin.

tokens.lyric: I sought the Lord, longing for Him, Bridegroom of my soul.

lines.raw: [F]I sought the Lord, longing for Him, Bridegroom of my soul.

tokens.lyric: Tortured my heart, suffering alone, fighting deepest pain,

lines.raw: [G7]Tortured my heart, suffering alone, fighting deepest pain,

tokens.lyric: Finally today I greet the Lord, gaining all comfort from Him.

lines.raw: [C]Finally today I greet the Lord, gaining all comfort from Him.

tokens.lyric: Finally today I greet the Lord, gaining all comfort from Him.

lines.raw: [F]Finally today I greet the Lord, gaining all comfort from Him.

tokens.lyric: Joy eternal lifting my heart, swelling within my breast;

lines.raw: [G7]Joy eternal lifting my heart, swelling within my breast;

tokens.lyric: Now I behold, Heavenly life, glory and happiness.

lines.raw: [C]Now I behold, Heavenly life, glory and happiness.

tokens.lyric: Always before stung by my sin, I was doomed to die.

lines.raw: [Em]Always before stung by my sin, I was doomed to die.

tokens.lyric: Finally today I am reborn, filled with abundant new life,

lines.raw: [F]Finally today I am reborn, filled with abundant new life,

tokens.lyric: Finally today I am reborn, filled with abundant new life.

lines.raw: [G7]Finally today I am reborn, filled with abundant new life.

tokens.lyric: O my dearest Heavenly bride, now you've come home at last,

lines.raw: [C]O my dearest Heavenly bride, now you've come home at last,

tokens.lyric: Deserts you crossed, searching for me, climbing the rocky peaks;

lines.raw: [Em]Deserts you crossed, searching for me, climbing the rocky peaks;

tokens.lyric: You persevered, faithful to me, longing for this day.

lines.raw: [F]You persevered, faithful to me, longing for this day.

tokens.lyric: How you've become lovely to see through all your suffering and pain,

lines.raw: [G7]How you've become lovely to see through all your suffering and pain,

tokens.lyric: How you've become lovely to see through all your suffering and pain.

lines.raw: [C]How you've become lovely to see through all your suffering and pain.

tokens.lyric: Come, O come, together we'll sing songs of eternal praise.

lines.raw: [F]Come, O come, together we'll sing songs of eternal praise.

tokens.lyric: Taste now my love, treasure so pure, Heaven's gift for you;

lines.raw: [G7]Taste now my love, treasure so pure, Heaven's gift for you;

tokens.lyric: All of my heart waited for you, yearning for this day.

lines.raw: [C]All of my heart waited for you, yearning for this day.

tokens.lyric: All of my heart waited for you now I can give you my love.

lines.raw: [F]All of my heart waited for you now I can give you my love.

tokens.lyric: All of my heart waited for you now I can give you my love.

lines.raw: [G7]All of my heart waited for you now I can give you my love.
